content.rendered:
3D EVOLUTION FRONT BAR SUITABLE FOR THE TOYOTA FORTUNER  IS HERE

-The Evolution Bumper is finished in a hard-wearing Flat Black Powder coat as standard and can be colour coded as an option. It is a 3 and 6mm steel construction and includes as standard a 5mm Aluminium bash plate and recovery points not offered on other brands. Trimming of the factory grill is required on the bar. The mid top section comes standard in Black or can be optioned as stainless steel. We also offer as standard, LED fog lights which are an option on many other brands.

Includes:

100% winch compatible with no additional bracket kits required

Integrated LED Foglights

5mm Aluminium Bash / Protection plate

2 x Vehicle recovery points

Optional:

Can be colour coded to your vehicle specification

Middle winch plate insert can be optioned as stainless steel

Shackles

Winch

Spotlight bar

Spotlights

excerpt.rendered:
RHINO BAR SUIT FORTUNER 16+

Please note: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order.
